column4: hmm, Linksys' stuff has really seemed to have degraded ever since Cisco bought them out.  I'd recommend Netgear's stuff if you're budget-conscious but still want decent quality

Well, facts are facts.  I have a Linky router and lsys has been extremely slow to release new firmware.  and most new firmware has been buggy at best, either introducing new bugs or breaking things that once worked.
